metadata.title: CVE-2024-43874 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: ccp - Fix null pointer dereference in __sev_snp_shutdown_lockedFix a null pointer dereference induced by DEBUG_TEST_DRIVER_REMOVE.Return from __sev_snp_shutdown_locked() if the psp_device or thesev_device structs are not initialized.
